brewery.brewery_description: Construction of a 22,000 m² brewery began in 1969 in the village of Bőcs, Hungary. The brewery began producing beer in 1973 with initial production of 874,000 hl. In 1991 after the fall of communism, the brewery was privatized and in 1993 it was purchased by the Belgian Interbrew (now InBev). The purchase of the brewery led to significant improvements in several aspects of brewing including higher quality, use of improved technology, and better product development. Although the company has been under foreign ownership since 1993, it still produces a line of Hungarian beers in addition to some foreign beers brewed under license.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 15 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 180 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 37!

user.bio: I travel a bit and I like beer a lot.

beer.beer_description:
Ismerős, de új. Borsodi, de IPA. Sör, de milyen! Olyan, mint egy váratlan fordulat egy átlagos napon, amit érdemes a haverokkal is megosztani. A Borsodira jellemző kesernyésség teszi az IPA sörök sajátosan citrusos és fűszeres ízvilágát igazán meglepővé.

-

Familiar but new.  Borsodi, but IPA. Beer, but what! It’s like an unexpected turn on an average day that you might want to share with your buddies as well. The bitterness of Borsodi makes the particularly citrusy and spicy flavors of IPA beers really surprising.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 335 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 68!

Ismerős, de új. Borsodi, de IPA. Sör, de milyen! Olyan, mint egy váratlan fordulat egy átlagos napon, amit érdemes a haverokkal is megosztani. A Borsodira jellemző kesernyésség teszi az IPA sörök sajátosan citrusos és fűszeres ízvilágát igazán meglepővé.

Familiar but new.  Borsodi, but IPA. Beer, but what! It’s like an unexpected turn on an average day that you might want to share with your buddies as well. The bitterness of Borsodi makes the particularly citrusy and spicy flavors of IPA beers really surprising.
Introduced in 2004 as a stronger (both in taste and alcohol content) light coloured beer.

Karakteres komlósság, Borsodis csavarral. Különleges kombinációja a könnyen iható, üde lágereknek és az erősebben komlózott felsőerjesztésű söröknek, ami a bátrabb komlóhasználattal nem csak a keserűséget, hanem különleges aromákat is visz a sörbe. A régi ismerős új arca: egy izgalmas ízvilágú, mégis könnyen iható sör, ami minden alkalomhoz passzol. Ez a Borsodi Hoppy.
Könnyen iható, színében és ízében is karakteres ale, amit a nemzetközi sörkultúra mesterei ihlettek.
Fruity peach-apple non-alcoholic shandy/ radler. The peach flavour is dominant. Light, refreshing, fruity, aromatic radler.
